channel.title: PSA: There is a skype section in the profile. Use it
channel.description:
That's all people.
(I constantly get PMs and etc to add people. my skype is quite literally on my profile. c'mon)

item.title: PSA: There is a skype section in the profile. Use it
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551433”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=670349.msg4482497#msg4482497 date=1431197762]

That’s all people.

(I constantly get PMs and etc to add people. my skype is quite literally on my profile. c’mon)

I thought everyone knew about that? :o
Suggestion: Should add the Skype icon next to the PM and email option under profile pictures in posts.
[/quote]
Yeah I thought everyone did too. But I keep getting PMs to add people. I’m like… m8, my skype is right there. add me.[/quote]
Haha, well hopefully this gets added in -
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670352.msg4482503.html#new

Read full topic
item.source: PSA: There is a skype section in the profile. Use it
